thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com | 2 of 336
thread.title: Joe Boyd
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Joe Boyd

author: Joe Boyd
title: Joe Boyd
text:
First off, The only reason I marked 4 out of 5 stars is because I find trying to easily order from the site has not gone too well for me.THAT is a technical problem. I have received great results by calling North Shore on the phone.The Customer Service has been outstanding.
I am a care giver for a lady and handle a lot of things for her that she has a problem taking care of herself. If I see an item that is new to me, the Customer Service folks always ask if I would like a sample of the product when order anything else from them.
Delivery times are very good and the orders are complete when they are delivered.
If I hear that anyone I know is in need of supplies for the products that North Shore Supply carries, I have suggested that they contact North Shore Supply and discuss what is needed. I usually give people the web address AND the phone number.
Joe Boyd
Antioch, Ca
